title: Antarctic crossing
creator_credit: George Lowe, James Carr and World Wide Pictures
brief_description: An account of the establishment and execution of the 1957-58 Commonwealth Trans-Antarctic Expedition under Sir Vivian Fuchs, with support by the New Zealand party under Sir Edmund Hillary. Includes excerpts from original films of the Scott and Shackleton Expedition by courtesy of the British Film Institute Archives.
